titles.title: Credit Union Community Development Enhancement Act of 1993
To enhance the resources available to community development credit unions.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR E2068)
Referred to the House Committee on Banking, Finance + Urban Affrs.

committee.name: House Committee on Banking, Finance + Urban Affrs

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Financial Institutions Supervision, Regulation and Deposit Insurance.

committee.name: House Banking, Finance, and Urban Affairs
House Banking, Finance, and Urban Affairs
committee.subcommittee: Financial Institutions Supervision, Regulation and Deposit Insurance

bill.summary: 8/6/1993--Introduced. Credit Union Community Development Enhancement Act of 1993 - Amends the Federal Credit Union Act to authorize appropriations for the Community Development Revolving Fund. Authorizes the National Credit Union Administration Board to: (1) invest idle moneys in Federal Treasury securities; and (2) exercise the authority granted it by the Community Development Credit Union Revolving Fund Transfer Act.
